sentences.en: The bishop planned to visit necessitous areas of the city.
sentences.cn: 主教打算走访城市里的贫困地区.

sentences.en: The power department is now facing a very necessitous and difficult problem, which is the scientizing and standardization of the method of power system parameter management.
sentences.cn: 对于目前的电力部门来说，面临着一个非常棘手而紧迫的任务，就是电网参数管理的规范化和科学化。

sentences.en: Thus, it is necessitous and extremely important to analyze and improve power system simulation veracity.
sentences.cn: 因此, 分析和提高电力系统动态仿真准确度已成为非常紧迫和极其重要的课题.

sentences.en: True individual freedom cannot exist without economic security and independence, and necessitous men are not free men.
sentences.cn: 真正的个人自由在没有经济安全和独立的情况下，是不存在的，贫者无自由。
